description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Harness the power of Newton's cradle to create mesmerizing music.  Featuring varied click sounds and a system that will help you turn your unsynchronised cradles into an astonishing orchestra. Experiment. Experience. Newton’s NEW Tones.
